short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Display Website information such as IP, ASN, ISP, and location.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Discover essential details about any website you visit!
This extension provides comprehensive insights into the website currently opened in your browser, including:

IP Address: Understand where the site is hosted.
ASN (Autonomous System Number): Learn about the network managing the site.
ISP (Internet Service Provider): Find out who provides hosting services.
Geolocation Details: View the country, state, city, latitude, and longitude of the website's server.
Perfect for tech enthusiasts, developers, and cybersecurity professionals who want to uncover the technical details behind the websites they visit.

Features:

Lightweight and easy to use.
No API key required for operation.
Instant results displayed in a clean and elegant interface.
Upgrade your browsing experience with this handy tool today!
